In 1905, Roberto Nevilis invented homework as a punishment for his students
Leonardo di Vinci died of a stroke at the age of 67
There are approximately 25 billion cells in a human body
A human baby is around 65% water
The speed of sound is approximately 343 meters per second
The U.S. state of New York was previously called New Netherland before 1624

Asia is the biggest continent by population, with a population of about 4.5 billion, which is around 60% of the world
